59340.affected_area: Atikokan, Thunder Bay, Manitouwadge, Nipigon, Terrace Bay, Marathon, Fort Frances, Dryden, Sioux Lookout, Sault Ste Marie and White River
live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59340.summary: Some customers in Atikokan, Thunder Bay, Manitouwadge, Nipigon, Terrace Bay, Marathon, Fort Frances, Dryden, Sioux Lookout, Sault Ste Marie and White River are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59340.title: Mar 23 - Atikokan, Thunder Bay, Manitouwadge, Nipigon, Terrace Bay, Marathon, Fort Frances, Dryden, Sioux Lookout, Sault Ste Marie and White River | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
